movies.title: Blodsband
movies.plot: Following an argument with her lover on her boat, a woman is found dead. Wallander and the Ystad police investigate; their inquiries lead them to a farm commune and to an old friend of Linda's.
movies.simplePlot: Following an argument with her lover on her boat, a woman is found dead. Wallander and the Ystad police investigate; their inquiries lead them to a farm commune and to an old friend of Linda's.

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Johanna Sällström was born on December 30, 1974 in Stockholm, Sweden. In 1997 she won the award Guldbaggen for best female leading role in the movie Beneath the Surface (1997), which became her big breakthrough. Getting tired off all the interest around herself she moved to Denmark where she worked at a café shop, but in year 2000 she went back to Sweden and continued her acting career. She was best known for playing the police agent Linda Wallander in Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005). Even though Johanna Sällström often played tough on the screen, it is said she was much more shy and quiet in her private life. Sällström was found dead by the police at her home in Malmö, Sweden on 13th of February 2007.
biography.name: Johanna Sällström

biography.bio: Ola Rapace was born on December 3, 1971 in Tyresö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Pär Ola Norell. He is an actor and producer, known for Skyfall (2012), Beyond (2010) and Together (2000). He was previously married to Noomi Rapace.
biography.name: Ola Rapace

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Ove Wolf is an actor, known for Dogville (2003), Häktet (2005) and Hammarkullen (1997).
biography.name: Ove Wolf

biography.bio: Fyr Thorvald Strömberg was born on July 9, 1966 in Ramundeboda, Örebro län, Sweden as Fyr Torvald Strömberg. He is an actor, known for Second Avenue (2007), Jalla! Jalla! (2000) and Miffo (2003).
biography.name: Fyr Thorvald Strömberg

biography.bio: Jonatan Blode is an actor, known for Spring Tide (2016), A Matter of Life and Death (2006) and When Darkness Falls (2006).
biography.name: Jonatan Blode

biography.bio: Camilla Larsson was born on December 31, 1971 in Rönninge, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Daybreak (2003), The King of Ping Pong (2008) and Seeds of the Fall (2009).
biography.name: Camilla Larsson

biography.bio: Simon Norrthon was born on August 4, 1967. He is an actor, known for Dark Woods (2003), Like It Never Was Before (1995) and Un pays idéal (2000).
biography.name: Simon Norrthon

biography.bio: Saga Gärde was born on February 24, 1979 in Råsunda, Solna, Stockholms län, Sweden as Saga Marianne Gärde. She is an actress, known for Bad Dreams (2006), Flicker (2012) and Instead of Abracadabra (2008).
biography.name: Saga Gärde

biography.bio: Åsa Persson is known for her work on Infidèle (2000), Saraband (2003) and Superhjältejul (2009).
biography.name: Åsa Persson

biography.bio: Bo Andersson is an actor, known for Zozo (2005), Kim Novak Never Swam in Genesaret's Lake (2005) and A Matter of Life and Death (2006).
biography.name: Bo Andersson

biography.bio: Karin Bergquist was born on April 11, 1975 in Kungälv, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Karin Elin Kristina Bergquist. She is an actress, known for Let the Right One In (2008), Labyrint (2007) and Keillers park (2006).
biography.name: Karin Bergquist

biography.bio: Karl Oscar Törnros was born on April 3, 1974 in Stockholm, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), Arn: The Knight Templar (2007) and Hot Dog (2002).
biography.name: Karl Oscar Törnros
